channel.title: json on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in json on Barefoot Rob

item.title: sample json over https
item.description: 09:16 Monday 05 October 2015 JST Going through a toot to create a tvOS app and need to download some json over HTTPS, or create an exception in the app. I set up HTTPS with startssl clunky wizardry and presto: https://apps.chatforest.com/tvos/api/1/sample.json The data is taken from https://www.themoviedb.org/ Which says I can just use https, but my tvos app gets a certificate warning.
